Replies.Reply: CHOI keeps looking around, making his way to the booth.
"No. Fuck you, Choi, you just think you can come and go when you please?"
"I know. Can't tow this crate fast enough! We gotta ditch it!"
"Can't, the core is still good. And they've got 'The One.'"
"Shut up and make the exit. Hold on!"
His lieutenant, a shadowy female figure, reaches for the radar screen.
THEY stop before the entrance to the DEAD DUCK.
"Who will you be now? The mother, or the father?"
"What if they toughen the Matrix code, like last time?"
picture of him, alongside photos of Neo, and Trinity.
CIRCA stands over  Trinity as the  rebels blue eyes  flutter open. Her whole body goes into a seizure and she chokes and screams as she grabs Circa.
"Just a few. Maybe two or three. Hundred."
"A concentric ring of defenses that shields Zion. The fighters that just saved us constitute the first ring."
"For the moment, perhaps. Its still a long drive home."
"We're almost home. We'll need a detail. Five minutes."
"Go on ship's liberty. Meet me in the Dead Duck at 21:00 hours, drunk or sober."
"So, how do you like having your own command?"
"You must be both mother and father to your crew."
"So, you can smack me around, Neo?"
His comments set a sober tone.
are team leaders. Neo is our secret weapon."
his potential, or he may have already reached it. We are to learn from him, as he does from us."
"And others are able to change the reality of the Matrix itself."
NIOBE jumps up and dresses quickly.
"It appears that they are learning their lessons."
"Tell Neo? About his predecessors, I suppose?"
"To me, none came before him. The Oracle told me I would find the one.
"There are lots of ifs. How about this one: What if we lose faith in our cause?"
"We have to download our mission specs. Move aside, I have to log into the mainframe."
RAZOR looks dubious, and turns to the screens.
"You know now, that you had predecessors."
Everything forseen to come to pass, has, except one thing."
"Your coming was heralded, and it is my destiny to prepare the world for you, and to baptize you by fire. But from here on out, no one knows."
"No one has heard from her or her priestesses since the day Cypher turned on us."

"I brought you deep, yet I no longer know the way. No one does. With every second we sink deeper than before. You are our guiding light, now. Your powers exceed mine a millionfold. I have shown you the path to victory, Neo. Lead us down it."
"They keep the left hand from seeing what the right hand is doing.
in contact. If you lose your cell, contact an operator immediately."
"Send through ghosts to confuse their lock."
"Keep your foot on the gas. Heal thyself."
"I thought Razor said their were two cops."

The apartment is luxuriously laid out and furnished. Gregory sits on a leather couch, watching  whatever on the  tube with the  sound off. He absentmindedly  manipulates a  quarter over  and around  his fingers.
"Yes, there is a problem. The Matrix exists."
NEO sinks to the ground, shocked. He shakes his head.
"You can do it. You can free us."

IN the blue twilight shade, NEO and TRINITY kiss tentatively,  slowly, then quicker as  they give in  to their feelings  for one another.  WE move around them slowly, then pan into the shadows, a natural fadeout.
hangs up the phone and touches the blood of her ear. The phone  rings.
CIRCA straddles her and plunges the massive needle into her chest.
"Hold on, folks, you're in for a little cleaning."
"Well, not yet, but we're in the defense screen."
"I'll have to take that one down now. Cypher..."
"Not you, though. Like you. There have been others, Neo."
"I know. I used to watch you hacking without sleeping for days."
"I don't know, Neo. Our mission was to find you."
"Now, Zion will give us a new mission."
"Your brain knows what to do. But it has to associate characters with your body."
"Not just you. Morpheus, myself. We were all born inside.
never predicted. Some seem to gain faster reflexes and strength.
"Morpheus, can you tell us what the mission is now?"
"In this construct program, the ground can kill."
"I want you to know how much faith I have in you."
"Casanova just ran into an old flame."
"Then the agents are out of touch with each other."
"Is he even alive? Is he captured?"
"No. I've never been a big sleeper."
"But what does it mean, to be The One?"
"How are their minds freed from the Matrix?"
CHOI eyes MORPHES and NIOBE coming toward them.
"Morpheus? Yeah, I smacked him around, too."
hard to find them on the keyboard?"
"Where did these symbols come from, anyway?"
"All numbers between zero and one. That could be an infinite number of numbers."
"Holy shit. How many calculations per second?"
"OK. At last count that was what, a gazillion, right? Two gazillion?"
"How did I end up as... a freak?"
"OK, so how do you explain me?"
"I think you can do anything you want, if you believe."
precariously on  the edge,  wobbling a  bit as  she maintains  balance against  nerves.  She  breathes  deep,  and  looks  back  up  at  NEO, maintaining her cool even as she eyes the spectacle.
"Showing me what? You nearly gave me a heart attack."
"Oh. And this requires acts of insanity?"
TRINITY steps away. NEO grabs her shoulder and turns her to him. He attempts a  kiss, but she turns her face, letting it land on her cheek.
"That there were others, like me, who you thought were going to be special. But they ended up dead."
"But she must have known, if they came to her."
"I thought I was working on a fucking database."
THE homeless  man is  astounded. As  he stands,  speechless, NEO fades back into the crowd.
"I was on to you the whole time. I only came in here to isolate you, to destroy you."
"I can. But if I destroy the Matrix, everyone within it will die."

THE three agents, helpless to stop him, watch as he walks for the door of the apartment. NEO opens it,  and stops, his face meeting a  flying FIST. His vision  FLASHES with the  impact, and he  staggers back into the room, falling on his ass and rolling back onto his feet.
the system will die. They will all die. There has to be a different way."
"Why me? Why the fuck do I have to do this?"
"Brough, you us your asses! We saved you so hard core you don't even know!"
"So, you think you finally found The One, huh? Another One?"
"What do you think, Dujour? Should we take him with us?"
Almost everyone is a fighter. Sometimes, even the kids.
"Our energy as a people is directed toward liberation. Check it out, here are some newcomers."
"Energy plant we raided on our last mission. There were some survivors."
The drinks arrive. Tall glasses of rum.
"You want to know what being The One means?"
"So, you went back in, and you two pulled him out?"
"Why are we always getting screwed? Not only do I have to go straight back into the shit, but I lose my command, too?"
"Are you using the right pulse wave?"
"And what do you think you were doing there, writing code for video games? You were working for The Man."
HE walks out  onto the street,  eyeing the phone  booth and everything else. A  gorgeous Asian  businesswoman stumbles  into him. Recognition lights up her face and she stops him.
"The jacket stops fragmentation. Sometimes they bomb the phones. Kiss me for luck."
MORPHEUS, NIOBE, and TRINITY rush to him, picking him up on his  feet.
"You still want me to call you? Ha ha ha!"
"Idiot, we helped him find him. Hello, Morpheus."
"Welcome to the real world, Neo. I'm glad you're here."
"Neo, we monitored your fight. Did you really gain enlightenment?"
"Yeah, we finally won against an agent?"
She glances at  Trinity, who falls  back against the  seat, turning to suppress a smile. Choi cracks up.
"Yeah, and headquarters thinks you might be able to whine the agents to death."
CHOI grabs a half-filled rum glass and swigs it down.
"Welcome home, brothers and sisters. First day back?"
an open-close base of zero or one, open or closed, they use all numbers between zero and one."
picture all the particles in the known universe. Not just atoms, but sub-atomic particles that compose atoms."
second the Matrix can perform is greater than the estimated number of particles in the known universe."
code, create, and maintain the Matrix, the agents, they are code.

"Well, my point is, the machines code and recode the Matrix by pure will. Interaction with the Matrix, the physical act of being there, by default, allows people to change their environment - the Matrix.
neural kinetics blast past those of average humans. This, combined with your ability to suspend disbelief, allow you to change the reality of the Matrix."
"Shut the fuck up and get back here."
"The Matrix, sir. The coding is going nuts."
"Not good, boss, I gotta compile a new descrambler."
if I remember right. They cut the signal and trapped him in there."
"Excuse me for dragging up painful memories, sir."
"Four fucking agents, no wonder so much processing power is devoted to them."
"All processing power is being re-diverted to the agent program."
MASSIVE attack of STATIC bursts on the line.
"Jesus, you too. Where the fuck are you?"
"Coming up on your left, ten miles, a rest stop."
RAZOR  turns to  Circa as  Matrix code  resumes its  cascade down  the screens.
"Come on, tough guy, come got some Razor."
"Did you see that? We beat him! A fucking agent! He gave up!"
TRINITY is sitting on the edge of her interface chair, looking like hell.
"His carrier signal just goes nowhere. But there is data going back and forth."
"As is the loss of our colleague."
"Withdraw your men and pursue the others. We have our own plans for this one."
"We have a backup copy of Agent Smith..."
"A backup is not good enough. We need to upgrade ourselves to meet the new threat."
"The terrorists have learned to bend our reality in ways we cannot.
"This is getting tiresome. Where do we go from here?"
humans, when we can let them fight for us?"
"Gregory Lowfield. He exhibits the traits we saw in Mr. Anderson."
SMITH flexes his arm, examines his hands, and feels his hair.
growing  louder as  it grows  dark, we  here the  rumble and  roar of motorcycles.
"I can teach you to beat me, you know."
"Help us, and both you and her will be free afterward."
can see, what you can rationally explain?"
But first, you need to learn to fight."
"Pain is only weakness leaving your body. When you are sufficiently strong, you will feel no pain."
terrorist dictatorship lead by the one called Morpheus."
"We need you to stop the terror. We need you to save our world."
abilities. You can turn you imagination into reality. See your hands striking me, see yourself overcoming me. Fight, boy!"
"We need you, Gregory. Will you help us stop this?"
"I will give you the power you need."
"You killed me too easy last time."
"I take it the great Morpheus failed to mention this?"
"What does that make you feel like? God?"
"Who do you think started this war, boy? Your kind tried to kill us first."
"I should have killed you the first chance I had."

WITH his hand pointed lazily at the sky, a single star starts  glowing stronger  and stronger.  It vibrates,  then fades  suddenly and  comes loose from the sky, and becomes a meteorite, burning across the sky.
GREGORY is staring down a dark highway.
"No. I only remember being on the bike."

She finally gets the remote and changes the channel. The volume  comes on, louder and  infinitely more tinny  and obnoxious than  anything in life. Chandra laughs at the images as Gregory stares into space.
She clings to  his legs as  they barrel down  the highway. They  blast pass a darkened cruiser.
THE PACK explodes with laughter. GREGORY walks up to the policeman and circles him, keeping the gun pointed in the business direction.
shooting at me. So, what do you want?"
CHANDRA walks up to him. Seductively, she hands him the bottle of hard liquour.
"We can only rebel so long. We can only push until they will hit back."
"Wake up! Get on your bikes and fucking ride!"

HE turns the headlights  back on, just in  time to see a  ROADBLOCK of heavy duty military trucks. In front  of the trucks is a sandbag  wall manned by soldiers. The trucks are flanked by police cars. And if  one looks closely enough, they  can see a pair  of AGENTS standing to  the side.
HE steps forward, only to have the image recede.
"First you try to kill me. Now you need me."
"Alright. But how can I fight him?"
"Yeah, you took a pretty good knock on the head. Do you know how we got this place?"
"THIS IS THE POLICE, STOP YOUR VEHICLES AND SURRENDER!"
"A better life for all. Life for her. And for you, a chance for revenge."
"Two years ago, Gregory, your parents were killed in a terrorist attack in the heart of the city."
"The terrorists were led by a certain individual."
"No one in the government can do what you can."
AGENTS BROWN and JONES look at one another.
GREGORY freezes, then bursts into questions.
standstill. The only way that we can see to win is by destroying their source of energy. We have to pull the plug on them. We must crash the Matrix."

What remains  of BROWN  flies forward.  CHOI helps  TRINITY up and the retreat into the building and  take cover under a window.  Through the window, we see military trucks, filled with troops, charging down  the street, toward the Metacortex  plaza. After the trucks  come rumbling, black-painted M1A2 ABRAMS tanks. A black APACHE HELICOPTER flies  over the convoy.
THE TRACER stops in front of NEO, and out of the air the HEAT round appears. Suspended in air, it shakes with violence. It accelerates backwards, flying straight back into the tank barrel.
"Just keep him in your sites, soldier."
"The Oracle is anxious to see you."
